name: racing-game-monorepo
description: Racing game monorepo with Hono server and Svelte client

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.dev: npm run build -w packages/core && concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/server" "npm run dev -w apps/web-svelte"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w packages/core && npm run typecheck --workspaces --if-present

author: Miles Edwards
